data.name: iFog GmbH - FogNet
data.notes:
We announce regional prefixes to our peers and Upstreams. 

We generally peer with the Route Server on any IXP we are present on.

Our Services include IP Transit; VPSs in Frankfurt, Barcelona, Zurich, London, Oslo and Kansas; Access to KleyReX, LocIX and NL-IX in Frankfurt and Amsterdam, CHIX-CH in Zurich.

We offer BGP Tunnels & Transit to Education and Personal Networks: tunnelbroker.li
